TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompareValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator

summary.span: 将用户在输入控件中输入的值与在另一个输入控件中输入的值或与常量值进行比较。

span.span: Compares the value entered by the user in an input control with the value entered in another input control, or with a constant value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件，如在输入控件，用户输入的值进行比较控件，与在另一个输入的控件或常量的值中输入的值。Use the control to compare the value entered by the user in an input control, such as a control, with the value entered in another input control or a constant value. 控件通过验证，如果输入控件的值与指定的条件相匹配， ，和/或属性。The control passes validation if the value of the input control matches the criteria specified by the , , and/or properties. 此外可以使用控件用于指示输入控件中输入的值是否可以转换为指定的数据类型属性。You can also use the control to indicate whether the value entered in an input control can be converted to the data type specified by the property. 指定要通过设置验证的输入的控件属性。Specify the input control to validate by setting the property. 如果你想要比较具有另一个输入控件的特定输入的控件，设置属性来指定要与进行比较的控件。If you want to compare a specific input control with another input control, set the property to specify the control to compare with. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的输入控件中输入的值不能将属性转换为指定的数据类型属性，但指定的输入控件中输入的值属性可以转换，正在验证的输入的控件被视为有效。If the value entered in the input control specified by the property cannot be converted to the data type specified by the property, but the value entered in the input control specified by the property can be converted, the input control being validated is considered valid. 因此，还应放置或上指定的输入控件的控件属性。Therefore, you should also place a or control on the input control specified by the property. 而不是输入控件与其他输入控件的值进行比较，可以为常量值的输入控件的值进行比较。Instead of comparing the value of an input control with another input control, you can compare the value of an input control to a constant value. 指定要与通过设置进行比较的常量值属性。Specify the constant value to compare with by setting the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的值不能将属性转换为指定的数据类型属性，将引发异常。If the value specified by the property cannot be converted to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. 请务必检查一个值的数据类型之前以编程方式将其分配给属性。Be sure to check the data type of a value before programmatically assigning it to the property. > [!NOTE] > 未设置这两和在同一时间的属性。Do not set both the and the property at the same time. 您也可以输入控件到另一个输入控件，或为常量值的值进行比较。You can either compare the value of an input control to another input control, or to a constant value. 如果设置了这两个属性，属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 使用属性来指定要执行，例如，大于、 等于等等的比较类型。Use the property to specify the type of comparison to perform, such as greater than, equal to, and so on. 如果您设置属性设置为`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，则控件将忽略和属性，并只需指示输入控件中输入的值是否可以转换为指定的数据类型属性。If you set the property to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, the control ignores the and properties and simply indicates whether the value entered in the input control can be converted to the data type specified by the property. 属性用于指定这两个比较值的数据类型。The property is used to specify the data type of both comparison values. 执行比较操作之前，这两个值是自动转换为此数据类型。Both values are automatically converted to this data type before the comparison operation is performed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当属性设置为和当前的日历类型为非公历时，验证程序执行仅服务器端验证。When the property is set to and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only. 验证程序客户端脚本支持仅公历日历。The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars. 下表列出了可以进行比较的各种数据类型。The following table lists the various data types that can be compared. |数据类型Data type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|字符串数据类型。A string data type.| |`Integer`|32 位有符号整数数据类型。A 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|双精度浮点数字数据类型。A double-precision floating-point number data type.| |`Date`|日期数据类型。A date data type.| |`Currency`|Decimal 数据类型。A decimal data type. 不能包含货币符号。It cannot contain currency symbols.| > [!NOTE] > 如果输入的控件为空，没有验证函数调用和验证成功。If the input control is empty, no validation functions are called and validation succeeds. 使用控件要求用户输入控件中输入数据。Use a control to require the user to enter data in the input control. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用控件内部控制，请确保验证程序控件与之关联的控件相同的面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关使用详细信息控制部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 有关验证控件的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about validation controls, see . ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以便它将生成符合辅助功能标准标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件中两个值进行比较控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to compare the values in two controls. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数将所有字段初始化为其默认值。The default constructor initializes any fields to their default values.

param.span: 包含用于在客户端上进行呈现的输出流的 。

summary.span: 将此控件的属性添加到输出流中，以便在客户端上呈现。

span.span: Adds the attributes of this control to the output stream for rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写中的自定义服务器控件的方法，以便错误消息始终以粗体显示。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the error message always appears in bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_comparevalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 检查有效值的控件属性。

span.span: Checks the properties of the control for valid values.

returns.span: 如果控件属性有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control properties are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义服务器控件，以便它始终返回的值的可见属性，只要属性的控件的页上，并且包含验证属性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns the value of the visible property, as long as the property of the control is on the page and contains validation properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.vb#2)]

exception.span: 目标属性的值无法转换为预期的 。

span.span: The value of a target property cannot be converted to the expected .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ControlToCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ControlToCompare : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置将与正在被验证的输入控件进行比较的输入控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the input control to compare with the input control being validated.

value.span: 将与正在被验证的输入控件进行比较的输入控件。

span.span: The input control to compare with the input control being validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定输入的控件，如控件，要与所验证的输入控件进行比较。Use the property to specify an input control, such as a control, to compare with the input control being validated. 如果此属性指定的输入的控件不是页上的控件，将引发异常。If the input control specified by this property is not a control on the page, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 未设置这两和在同一时间的属性。Do not set both the and the property at the same time. 您也可以输入控件到另一个输入控件，或为常量值的值进行比较。You can either compare the value of an input control to another input control, or to a constant value. 如果设置了这两个属性，属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果要比较的控件被隐藏，或者是在容器内 (如控件) 的不可见，请验证程序执行仅服务器端验证。If the control to compare is hidden or is inside a container (such as a control) that is not visible, the validator performs server-side validation only. 验证程序客户端脚本支持只有可见的控件。The validator client script supports only visible controls. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要与所验证的控件进行比较的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the control to compare with the control being validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，此方法包含代码，以确定输入控件中的值是否有效。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this method contains the code to determine whether the value in the input control is valid.

returns.span: 如果输入控件中的值有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义服务器控件，以便它始终返回`true`两个指定控件的值是否相同和`false`否则为。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns `true` if the values of the two specified controls are the same and `false` otherwise. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCompareValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_comparevalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator Operator { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::ValidationCompareOperator value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要执行的比较操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the comparison operation to perform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要执行的比较操作。Use the property to specify the comparison operation to perform. 下表列出了可使用的比较操作。The following table lists the comparison operations that are possible. |操作Operation|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Equal`|正在验证的输入的控件和另一个控件的值或常量的值之间的相等性比较。A comparison for equality between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`NotEqual`|正在验证的输入的控件和另一个控件的值或常量的值之间不相等比较。A comparison for inequality between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`GreaterThan`|正在验证的输入的控件和另一个控件的值或常量的值之间的大于比较。A comparison for greater than between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`GreaterThanEqual`|大于或等于所验证的输入的控件和另一个控件的值或常量的值之间比较。A comparison for greater than or equal to between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`LessThan`|正在验证的输入的控件和另一个控件的值或常量的值之间的小于比较。A comparison for less than between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`LessThanEqual`|小于或等于所验证的输入的控件和另一个控件的值或常量的值之间比较。A comparison for less than or equal to between the values of the input control being validated and another control, or a constant value.| |`DataTypeCheck`|正在验证的输入控件中输入的值和指定的数据类型的数据类型比较属性。A data type comparison of the value entered in the input control being validated and the data type specified by the property. 如果值不能转换为指定的数据类型验证失败。Validation fails if the value cannot be converted to the specified data type. **注意：** 和时使用此运算符时，将忽略属性。**Note:** The and properties are ignored when this operator is used.| 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的比较操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the comparison operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的比较运算符不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified comparison operator is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValueToCompare { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValueToCompare : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个常量值，用于与用户在正被验证的输入控件中输入的值进行比较。

span.span: Gets or sets a constant value to compare with the value entered by the user in the input control being validated.

value.span: 用于与用户在正被验证的输入控件中输入的值进行比较的常量值。

span.span: The constant value to compare with the value entered by the user in the input control being validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定与用户在正在验证的输入控件中输入的值进行比较的常量值。Use the property to specify a constant value to compare with the value entered by the user in the input control being validated. 如果指定此属性的常量值无法转换为指定的数据类型属性，将引发异常。If the constant value specified by this property fails to convert to the data type specified by the property, an exception is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 未设置这两和在同一时间的属性。Do not set both the and the property at the same time. 您也可以输入控件到另一个输入控件，或为常量值的值进行比较。You can either compare the value of an input control to another input control, or to a constant value. 如果设置了这两个属性，属性优先。If both properties are set, the property takes precedence. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性中的用户输入的值进行比较与常量值的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to compare the value entered by the user in a control with a constant value. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CompareValidator.ValueToCompare Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
